item.description:
Hello Ladies!
Our next event will be this Tuesday for Flamenco and Tapas!
There is no cover to get in, however tapas and beverages range between $4-$12 a great deal.
Just a heads up, I may most likely not be able to attend this event, but our one time co-organizer of this event Romana Claretta will be there to host and greet you wonderful ladies at the door! This should be an amazing event, but as stated for the last event, please no last minute cancellations, as reservations can be canceled by the venue if the entire party is not present. So please make sure you will be attending, and cancel by Monday12noon if you have too, and...
ENJOY THE SHOW!!!
--Lisa:)

See more details below for location.
See you at the next meet up Madams !

Event details:
-Time: 8pm for dinner and sangria. show starts at 9pm.

-Cost Tapas menu ranges from $4-$12. please take a look at their menu http://www.xicala.net...

-Address:
151-B Elizabeth St. NYC, NY 10012 | Tel: (212) 219-0599



-How will you find Romana! She will be wearing a leather jacket and standing out front :)
http://www.xicala.net...
item.how_to_find_us: Romana will be wearing a leather jacket and standing out front :)
item.name: Tuesday Flamenco Show & Tapas Event !!
